entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023
